EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Accelerate 2014 – Agenda online – do you have any ideas?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 September 18, 2014 Hotel Intercontinental Vienna Full-day Event
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014
Dear Tricentis Customers and Partners,
On September 18th, Tricentis Accelerate 2014 will be here once again. As always, we’ll be focusing on the challenges confronting Global 5000 businesses, software testing for the next generation of apps, and other topics dealing with business innovation.
Don’t miss our exciting break-out sessions featuring experts in testing from around the world. This year’s topics include:
- Optimize – Risk Coverage - Virtualize – Systems & Services - Automate – Model-Based Test Automation - Agile Testing
Be sure to stay for our evening event, including an informal dinner and social hour.
Register now <http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>.
For the event agenda and more info, visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
Best Regards,
Wolfgang Platz Founder & Chief Product Officer Tricentis
Franz Fuchsberger Co-Founder & Chief Sales Officer Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
